name: mcp-python-sdk
description: Model Context Protocol SDK - Python implementation with npm automation

scripts.install: echo 'Installing Python dependencies...' && command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'Error: uv is not installed. Please install it from https://docs.astral.sh/uv/' && exit 1) && uv sync --frozen
scripts.build: echo 'Building documentation...' && uv run --frozen --no-sync mkdocs build
scripts.deploy: echo 'Deploying documentation...' && uv run --frozen --no-sync mkdocs gh-deploy --force
scripts.lint: echo 'Running linters...' && uv run --frozen --no-sync ruff check .
scripts.format: echo 'Formatting code...' && uv run --frozen --no-sync ruff format .
scripts.format:check: echo 'Checking code format...' && uv run --frozen --no-sync ruff format --check .
scripts.dev: echo 'Starting development server...' && uv run --frozen --no-sync mkdocs serve
scripts.clean: echo 'Cleaning build artifacts...' && rm -rf dist/ build/ .pytest_cache/ .ruff_cache/ site/
scripts.pre-commit: echo 'Running pre-commit checks...' && uv run --frozen --no-sync pre-commit run --all-files

author: Anthropic, PBC.
